title: 1BR/1BA APT. IN A PET-FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD NEAR DOWNTOWN SAN CARLOS
posting_body: ['Trestle', 'Address:', '333 El Camino Real San Carlos, CA 94070', 'Plan 1G  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 805 Sq.', 'Ft / From $3,711', '* Unit 4308 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 4209 - Available 08/10/22', 'Trestle is a modern mission revival nestled in the heart of San Carlos – the “City of Good Living".', 'Only new luxury apartment property in the city of San Carlos.', 'Simplify your life when you lease this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment now offered at Trestle.', 'The bedroom closet will keep your belongings in order with its Elfa closet organization system.', 'The stainless steel appliances in the chef-style kitchen make cooking a joy, while an in-home washer and dryer set adds to the convenience.', 'The homes at Trestle are technologically up-to-date with LATCH keyless entry systems and NEST thermostats.', 'With wood-style flooring and decorator colors, you’ll love the aesthetics on the inside and the lovely mission-style architectural details on the outside at Trestle.', 'A rooftop deck with fire pits, grilling stations, and an outdoor kitchen makes an ideal place to meet your neighbors or relax after a long day.', 'Even more recreational opportunities can be found indoors at the tech-forward fitness center or inside the clubhouse lounge with free Wi-Fi.', 'Pricing and availability may change.', 'Call today.', 'Floor Plan Specials', '1 Month Free on Select Apartments', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Closet Organizers', '* Floor - Second', '* View - Street', '* Location - End/Corner Unit', '* View - Hills/Mountains', '* LVT (wood-look)', '* Unique Renovation', '* Exterior - Covered/Reserved Pa', '* Floor - Third', '* View - Bay and City Views', '* Medium patio/balcony', 'Property Amenities:', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '* Availability24Hours', '* SmokeFree', '* ShortTermLease', '* PackageReceiving', '* Elevator', '* Gate', '* Laundry', '* Garage', '* CoverPark', '* Transportation', '* WirelessInternet', '* HighSpeed', '* NightPatrol', '* ClubHouse', '* Sundeck', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* Pool', '* Spa', '* ConferenceRoom', '* Recycling', '*', 'Other', '* JoggingWalkingTrails', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Other', 'We provide 1 assigned parking space per apartment.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x532', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
